metadata.title: CVE-2022-2380 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: The Linux kernel was found vulnerable out of bounds memory access in thedrivers/video/fbdev/sm712fb.c:smtcfb_read() function. The vulnerabilitycould result in local attackers being able to crash the kernel.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
linux-lts-xenial: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
